name: Let's Go Collection Crew!
description:
Controls
  • Press on the arrows on the side of the board to get the boyz running
  • R key on game screen quick restarts the game

Order the collection boyz to run and stack up books of the same color!
Watch out though since you only have 90 seconds, and if a stack has three different colors there's a penalty!

A game I made for Unity1Week, a Japanese 1 week game jam, translated to English. 

Admittedly there's some parts of the rules that are a bit unintuitive, though it should be fine if you're just checking it out. There's a text file with more details that you can download though if you're interested.

Misc.
  • Azuki Font (http://azukifont.com/)
  • SFX/Music from OtoLogic (https://otologic.jp/)
